about_the_game:
Conquest Tactics: Realm of Sin is a dark fantasy roguelite that combines turn-based strategy and tactical gameplay. Step into a world torn by chaos and sin as a Commander whose choices will shape the fate of the realm.

STRATEGIZE, COMMAND, CONQUER

Master the art of tactical, turn-based combat where every move counts. Enter the Commanding State to position your units with precision, rotating, moving, and deploying them strategically. Will you play it safe or take bold risks to achieve victory?

A WORLD SHAPED BY SIN

Navigate a realm steeped in darkness, where the unique Sin system makes each decision impactful. Travel the world map, advancing time and increasing Threat Levels with each move, as foes grow deadlier and choices grow heavier.

FORGE YOUR LEGACY

Explore diverse, dangerous environments, from Shrines to the Sunlight Cathedral, each filled with secrets and challenges. Confront powerful enemies, forge alliances, and leave a mark on this world where every choice has consequences. Will you bring order to the chaos, or will darkness prevail?
